rows.label: tev015801_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015801_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Beats about the duties of a Mediator.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015801_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015801_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Beats if he's heard any interesting rumors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015801_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Beats about Miran weather.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015801_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Beats about division rewards.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015801_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Beats if anything is troubling him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015801_SEL1041
rows.name: Ask Beats about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015801_MSG0001
rows.name:
Mediators are like the handymen of New LA.
The city residents come to us with every little
problem they have.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015801_MSG0002
rows.name:
We get people coming up to us with all sorts of
complicated requests that aren't ever posted at
Mission Control.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015801_MSG0003
rows.name:
But I bet you know exactly what I'm talking about.
You've got the sort of vibe where I bet folks just
walk up to you asking for help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015801_MSG0004
rows.name:
And when they do, I hope you hear 'em out.
Because every time that happens, it makes our job
a little bit easier.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015801_MSG0005
rows.name:
You got that? You gotta do what you can to help.
For the people, and for the future of New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015801_MSG0008
rows.name:
You know what they call that unfinished road up
ahead? It's the "Long Road to Hell."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015801_MSG0009
rows.name:
That's because in the dead of night, drunks and clumsy
folk walk right off the edge and tumble down to the
lower level of the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015801_MSG0010
rows.name:
Fortunately there's that shock-absorbing gel stuff
down below, so it's not like they die or anything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015801_MSG0011
rows.name:
But once you fall, the only way to get back here is to
clamber up one of those red pipes, then climb a really
long emergency staircase.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015801_MSG0012
rows.name:
The fall may not kill you, but the way back sure sucks.
No wonder they call it hell![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015801_MSG0017
rows.name:
Outside of the city, a change in weather could mean
the difference between life and death.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015801_MSG0018
rows.name:
Rain obstructs your visibility, making it hard to hit
indigens with gunfire.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015801_MSG0019
rows.name:
I've even heard that some places literally rain fire and
brimstone. You could end up being critically injured just
by walking around.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015801_MSG0020
rows.name:
If the weather takes a turn for the dangerous,
one way to survive is to go hide in a cave or
something like that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015801_MSG0021
rows.name:
You gotta pay attention to any changes in your
environment if you want to survive on this harsh world.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015801_MSG0027
rows.name:
The money and supplies given to a division are
divided among their members as rewards.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015801_MSG0028
rows.name:
The more active the division, the more money and
items it gets to distribute.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015801_MSG0029
rows.name:
I had to front pretty much every penny I had to my
brother Dart so he could salvage his Skell, and now
I'm flat broke.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015801_MSG0030
rows.name:
So it would be great if you could really step things
up with your Mediator work. ...Please, man.
I need to get paid here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015801_MSG1001
rows.name:
I saw a bunch of Prone dancing some weird dance the
other day, so I demanded they explain themselves.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015801_MSG1002
rows.name:
Then they got mad at ME and told me not to interrupt
their "Dance of Earthly Tribute."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015801_MSG1003
rows.name:
I don't care how important it is to their culture or
whatever. If they do some crazy dance at a place like
this, folks are gonna freak out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015801_MSG1004
rows.name:
I wish I could make them see that, but I'll never be
able to explain it to them now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015801_MSG1005
rows.name:
We've been having more and more of these sorts
of problems since the xenoforms started coming here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015801_MSG1010
rows.name: Those Prone are going to live with us in the city![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015801_MSG1011
rows.name:
I know the Dance of Earthly Tribute seems a little
dubious, but it's not our place to judge.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015801_MSG1012
rows.name:
In fact, I figured I'd try moving to its rhythm just once
to see what it was like. And you know what...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015801_MSG1013
rows.name:
It's INCREDIBLE! Lately, I've just been casting my duties
aside and dancing with the Prone till dawn![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015801_MSG1014
rows.name:
You gotta try it. ...No, really! Come on!
Let's go bust some moves, Prone style![ST:wait ]
